attributes.action: A debate on why the government won't hold an inquiry into  grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: Because we the people need answers and people need to be held to account
attributes.background: Parliament needs to find out why the current government won't have an enquiry into the grooming gang scandal which was and still is a blight on this country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
